post:
Hi everyone,

We are once again bringing back our free credit promotion.

Receive $50 Free Credit to trial Quantum Core's service. To redeem this credit, you will need to add a minimum of $10 to your account (which will automatically trigger the free credit). 

To view more information on this promotion go to https://quantumcore.com.au/freecredit

VPS packages start at $5 per month for Linux servers and $15 for Windows VPS (standard pricing - no promotion).
Hosting packages start at $4 per month (standard pricing - no promotion)

*Limited availability

To see more information and plans go to https://quantumcore.com.au/

----------------------------------------------------------------

Our servers have a 1Gb link, Intel GoldLake CPU's and is purely NVMe storage.

Quantum Core servers are located in Equinix Data Centres in Sydney.

Our ping/tracert IP is: 103.246.250.3
Looking Glass: https://lg.quantumcore.com.au/
